replies.body: I'm really glad they kept Twisted Fate in the Tango splash art. Wonder if his splash will be updated to be consistent with Evelynn.
it will be.
It has been.
Its true, this is a bonus splash update for Tango Twisted Fate.
Shadow Evelynn is her as a student of Zed, right?
needless to say, she looks like the girl version of shadow assassin kayn (even the same palette)
Maybe Kayn has very intriguing little secet.
That double-crossing, cross-dressing, bastard.
But Kayn was gay wasnt he
where is that in the lore lol

People take Kayn admiring gay as homosexual attraction when it isn't.

Edit: Zed not gay. Not editing out because I lol'd.
She looks more like a Vampire than anything.
I thought she is supposed to be a succubus?
He may have said that because of all the bats flying around. Her hair ornament (or horns?) also resembles bat wings.

I thought exactly the same. 
She even has a shadow mark, it's something like a "tattoo" that appears naturally, the stronger bond one have with the shadows, the more they will have.

The hair being like Kayn makes it 100% sure.

"How do we bring Safecracker up to par?"

"Throw in a grappling hook and call it a day?"

"Genius!"
Safecracker splash was already up to modern standards, they just needed to make Eve match her new model.
They also changed her skin tone and outfit. I just wanted to make a joke.
That joke fell a little short.
{{champion:45}}
https://i.imgur.com/O0Hft74.jpg?noredirect
I rerolled a shadow eve skin shard a year ago. I even thought "what if this looks cool in the rework...nah" From this day forward every action I take will be steeped in the deep swamps of regret.
I keep deadly kennen, union jack fiddlesticks, and some panth and mundo skin shards for just this reason.
deep swamp of rework u mean

Shadow looks the closest to BDSM thematics. 

I will miss BDSM straps Evelynn.

is it just me or her figure in tango splash is slimmer and less...hourglass like? in that case it would make it even more awesome as her demonic powers should let her be in the shapes/figures that her prey desires the most! 

i feel bad for those sad fools though.when you think about her title,death sound like a sweet deal compared to whats coming!

This was one of my favorite tangents when thinking about Evelynn - how her projection of what humans desire would evolve with time... she's had so long to perfect it and learn :D

These days, the booty is definitely "in".
Runettera people got some nice taste it seems! ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)

Yeah, that's what I thought too.
She's a seductress and altering her appearance to better match her prey's tastes is totally something Evelynn would do given her demonic shadow form is her true appearance anyways.

Every one of these women look different and the only connection you can draw here is the piercing glare and the tendril-like clothing on her back.

I wonder when her kit is going to be revealed.
Shouldn't it be up already? .__.

And I really want to see the new roadmap to see the next VGU coming as well as the next champion teaser.....
right...they are dragging this way too long
Its been like 2 days...
Shadow Eve is best girl.
https://pbs.twimg.com/media/CouoMpsWEAAldze.jpg

Dat Shadow Evelynn though

https://lovelace-media.imgix.net/uploads/315/81a55010-f8da-0133-f1aa-0aacbc4f5d01.gif?w=740&h=306&fit=max&auto=format

Black hair, pale skin, thigh highs, and tattoos (I think, might just be shadow. Still works though)..... oh myyyy

https://uploads.disquscdn.com/images/f4f0f78ae15fb7a0817b49bcfb056b186031716c41982bd3f4a800e155b9624d.jpg
I prefer this mysterious Minx.

https://media.tenor.com/images/6ff8995a0aaa11cddb9da812baffc631/tenor.gif

Red hair, glowing amber eyes, a beautiful grin, and still thigh highs. It is a close 2nd to be sure.
Why is the splash for Tango Eve so mismatched from her actual model? The skin and hair are completely different.
Now we wait for the hentai.
I give it less than a day. It does help that these were revealed at the beginning of the day.
I think some have already started coming out since the teaser. Likely going to see a flood of them. Though getting to Ahri/Sona levels is the real challenge.

Oh I thought we were talking specifically about the skins. There's already a decent & growing number about the base. 
Now that number will multiply by 4 ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°).
( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°) my body is ready ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I see y'all man of culture too ( ͡° ͜ʖ ͡°)
I'm homosexual ( ͡°_ʖ ͡°)

tango evelyn is perfect, is a dance as much as is a battle, like in mr and mrs smith movie
seduction and danger in a single picture, now we need more dance themes

where is swam lake orianna?
idk maybe after swan lake orianna?

I really don't like how Shadow Eve's hat/crown thing is fucking huge in game or that her lips looks cakey.
Nor that her Tango splash is mismatch to her ingame model. Pink hair, pale skin, vs blue hair, blue skin.
I hope Shadow Eve is the 'crappy skin they make really good', like arcane Galio and tundra warwick.
